name: Chaos Roulette
description:
Created in Unity for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in just one week! The theme was: Let There Be Chaos.

Grab a friend and a gun and go head-to-head on Chaos Island, a mysterious structure on which reality is governed by the Chaos Roulette! The Roulette determines what hazards you will face. No matter what comes your way, only one thing matters: shoot your opponent into oblivion and prove you are the Chaos Champion! Legend has it that the ultimate chaos will reveal itself on the ninth round...

Controls:

Player 1

Move: WASD

Jump: Spacebar

Shoot: Left Shift or J

Player 2

Move: Numpad or Arrow Keys

Jump: Right Shift

Shoot: Right Ctrl or '/'

Controllers

Move: Left Stick

Jump: 'A' Button

Shoot: 'X' Button

Asset Credit:

Character Controller Pro by Lightbug - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/character-controller-pro-159...

Stylized Lava materials by Rob luo - https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/texOtures-materials/stylized-lava-materi...

OpenGameArt - https://opengameart.org/

FreeSound - https://freesound.org/
